page.title: 10Organisations and Events
page.content: {A CHILDS VIEW OF WHAT GOES ON IN {TODMORDEN. I like Todmorden.It has a park with swings and a climbing frame.In May there is a Carnival.In June there is an Agricultural Show.In August there is a Soap Box Derby.We have a St. John Ambulance Brigade.We have Brownies, Guides, Cub Scouts and Scouts.We also have a Brass Band.The well known Operatic Society and Todmorden Players put on shows at the Hippodrome Theatre, and there is a Gang Show every year.There is a Cricket Club and lots of football teams.In August everyone joins in a Pram Race.At Christmas we have carol singing round a Christmas tree near the Town Hall.
